name: enterprise-admin_list-self-hosted-runners-in-group-for-enterprise
description:
Lists the self-hosted runners that are in a specific enterprise group.

You must authenticate using an access token with the `admin:enterprise` scope to use this endpoint.

enterprise.description: The slug version of the enterprise name. You can also substitute this value with the enterprise id.

runner_group_id.description: Unique identifier of the self-hosted runner group.

per_page.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

page.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
